# NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.default

**Case**

The default indicator that shows a proposed correction.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Constants

- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.reversion**: Provides the option to revert to the original form after a correction has been made.
- **NSSpellChecker.CorrectionIndicatorType.guesses**: Shows multiple alternatives from which the user may choose the appropriate spelling.
